message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you consider that?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go all the way to $125, but I'm willing to compromise again. How about we meet at $127?
I'm getting close to a deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $123. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close too! I can meet you at $124.5. That's the best I can do.
I really appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $123.50. Can you meet me there?
